text: 14.12 The Urban Structure and Characterisation Study (2009, and a 2016 addendum) defined 24 specific ‘places’ or neighbourhoods within Tower Hamlets, and set out what makes those places unique. This study can provide a starting point for understanding how a development site fits within the wider context of its surrounding neighbourhood and can help to determine positive elements of local character that can be accentuated through new development.
